sections.title: C Programming Certifications
sections.description: Master C programming with these certification courses, from basics to advanced concepts.

resources.name: C Programming for Beginners Certification (Udemy)
resources.description: Comprehensive C programming course with certification. Covers syntax, pointers, memory management, and more.

resources.name: Advanced C Programming Course (Coursera)
resources.description: Master advanced C programming concepts with hands-on projects and earn a verified certificate.

resources.name: C Programming with Linux Professional Certificate (edX)
resources.description: Learn C programming and Linux together, earn a verified professional certificate from Dartmouth.

resources.name: Introduction to C Programming (FreeCodeCamp)
resources.description: Free certification course covering C programming fundamentals with hands-on exercises.

resources.name: C Programming Master Course (CodeCademy)
resources.description: Interactive C programming course with hands-on coding exercises and certification.

resources.name: Scaler Topics: C Programming (Free)
resources.description: A comprehensive, free C programming course by Scaler Topics. Covers basics to advanced topics, includes quizzes and coding practice. No certificate, but great for learning and interview prep.

resources.name: Data Structures with C (NPTEL, IIT Kharagpur)
resources.description: Advanced course covering data structures implementation in C. Learn from IIT Kharagpur faculty with programming assignments and examples.

resources.name: Problem Solving with C (NPTEL, IIT Kharagpur)
resources.description: Learn problem-solving techniques using C programming. Includes algorithmic thinking and practical coding exercises from IIT Kharagpur.

resources.name: Data Structures and Algorithms with C (NPTEL)
resources.description: Comprehensive course covering DSA implementation in C. Includes theoretical concepts and practical implementations with detailed examples.

resources.name: C Language Tutorial in Hindi (CodeWithHarry)
resources.description: Complete C programming tutorial series in Hindi by CodeWithHarry. Perfect for beginners with practical examples and coding exercises.

sections.title: Java Programming Certifications
sections.description: Comprehensive Java courses and certification paths — free and paid — for beginners through advanced learners.

resources.name: Java Programming (MOOC.fi)
resources.description: University of Helsinki's free, self-paced Java Programming I & II course. Includes extensive exercises and certificates available via the MOOC.fi profile completions page.

resources.name: CodeWithHarry - Java Tutorials (Playlist)
resources.description: Beginner-friendly Java tutorials by CodeWithHarry. Practical examples and Hindi/English explanations — great for hands-on learning.

resources.name: Abdul Bari - Java SE Programming (Udemy)
resources.description: Abdul Bari's comprehensive Java SE Programming course on Udemy. In-depth coverage of core Java concepts with excellent teaching methodology. Highly recommended for conceptual clarity.

resources.name: Java Programming and Software Engineering Fundamentals (Coursera)
resources.description: A multi-course specialization covering Java programming, data structures, and software engineering fundamentals. Free to audit, paid for verified certificate.

resources.name: Java Programming: Complete Beginner to Advanced (Udemy)
resources.description: Popular Udemy course covering core Java from basics to advanced topics with exercises and a completion certificate.

resources.name: Java In-Depth: Become a Complete Java Engineer (Udemy)
resources.description: Comprehensive paid course on Udemy that covers modern Java development practices and interview preparation.

sections.title: Core Programming
sections.description: Foundational programming courses from the OSSU curriculum.

resources.name: Systematic Program Design (UBC, edX)
resources.description: Learn systematic program design and functional programming principles.

resources.name: Programming Languages (UW, Coursera)
resources.description: Covers the basic concepts of programming languages and interpreters.

resources.name: Object-Oriented Design (UCSD, Coursera)
resources.description: Learn object-oriented design and software architecture.

sections.title: Core Systems
sections.description: Systems and computer architecture resources from OSSU.

resources.name: Nand to Tetris: Build a Modern Computer (Coursera)
resources.description: Build a computer from first principles, from logic gates to operating systems.

resources.name: Operating Systems: Three Easy Pieces (Book)
resources.description: A free, comprehensive book on operating systems concepts.

sections.title: Core Theory
sections.description: Algorithm and theory resources from OSSU.

resources.name: Divide and Conquer, Sorting and Searching, and Randomized Algorithms (Stanford, Coursera)
resources.description: Learn core algorithmic techniques for problems that arise in computing applications.

resources.name: Greedy Algorithms, Minimum Spanning Trees, and Dynamic Programming (Stanford, Coursera)
resources.description: Explore greedy algorithms, minimum spanning trees, and dynamic programming.

resources.name: Cybersecurity Fundamentals (RIT, edX)
resources.description: Introduction to cybersecurity principles and practices.

sections.title: Core Applications
sections.description: Databases, machine learning, and application-focused resources from OSSU.

resources.name: Databases: Modeling and Theory (Stanford, edX)
resources.description: Covers relational databases, SQL, and data modeling.

resources.name: Machine Learning (Stanford, Coursera)
resources.description: Andrew Ng's famous machine learning course.

sections.title: Core Math
sections.description: Essential mathematics for computer science, including calculus and discrete math.

resources.name: Calculus 1A: Differentiation (MIT)
resources.description: Learn the basics of differentiation in calculus from MIT on edX.

resources.name: Calculus 1B: Integration (MIT)
resources.description: Covers the fundamentals of integration in calculus, from MIT on edX.

resources.name: Calculus 1C: Coordinate Systems & Infinite Series (MIT)
resources.description: Explore coordinate systems and infinite series in calculus, from MIT on edX.

resources.name: Mathematics for Computer Science (MIT OCW)
resources.description: Discrete mathematics and proofs for computer science, from MIT OpenCourseWare.

sections.title: Computer Science Fundamentals
sections.description: Start your journey here with the core concepts of computation, data structures, and algorithms that power all software.

resources.name: Harvard's CS50x
resources.description: The definitive introduction to computer science. Engaging, comprehensive, and free.

resources.name: Abdul Bari's Algorithms Playlist
resources.description: Legendary YouTube playlist that masterfully explains complex algorithms.

resources.name: GeeksforGeeks
resources.description: A vast library of articles and code examples for data structures and algorithms.

resources.name: freeCodeCamp - Data Structures Course
resources.description: A full 8-hour YouTube course covering everything you need for data structures.

sections.title: Web Development (Frontend)
sections.description: Learn to build beautiful and interactive user interfaces for websites and web applications.

resources.name: The Odin Project
resources.description: A complete, project-based curriculum for becoming a full-stack developer.

resources.name: MDN Web Docs
resources.description: The ultimate reference for all web technologies (HTML, CSS, JS).

resources.name: Kevin Powell's YouTube Channel
resources.description: A master of CSS. His tutorials make complex CSS simple and fun.

resources.name: Fireship.io
resources.description: Fast-paced, modern tutorials on JavaScript and popular frameworks.

sections.title: Web Development (Backend)
sections.description: Power your applications by learning how to work with servers, databases, and APIs.

resources.name: CodeWithHarry
resources.description: Excellent resource (Hindi/English) for Node.js, Python with Django, and databases.

resources.name: Traversy Media
resources.description: Countless project-based tutorials on Node.js, Express, and databases.

resources.name: PostgreSQL Exercises
resources.description: Practice your SQL skills with this interactive website.

sections.title: AI & Machine Learning
sections.description: Dive into the world of artificial intelligence, learning how to build models that can learn from data.

resources.name: Andrew Ng's ML Specialization
resources.description: The most famous and highly-recommended introductory course on the topic.

resources.name: Krish Naik's YouTube Channel
resources.description: Massive collection of playlists covering everything in ML, deep learning, and data science.

resources.name: Kaggle
resources.description: The best platform for practicing your ML skills with real-world datasets and competitions.

sections.title: Essential Tools & Practices
sections.description: Master the essential tools and workflows that every professional developer uses daily.

resources.name: Git - The Simple Guide
resources.description: A straightforward, no-nonsense guide to getting started with Git.

resources.name: GitHub Skills
resources.description: Fun, interactive courses to learn how to use GitHub effectively.

resources.name: Learn Command Line
resources.description: A free and simple introduction to the command line interface.

sections.title: Career Preparation
sections.description: Prepare for the job market with interview practice, resume tips, and portfolio guidance.

resources.name: LeetCode
resources.description: The premier platform for practicing coding interview questions.

resources.name: Gaurav Sen's System Design Playlist
resources.description: A fantastic resource for understanding how to design large-scale systems.

resources.name: FreeCodeCamp - Responsive Web Design
resources.description: Hands-on interactive web design curriculum for HTML & CSS
